name: Endless Horror (Infinity)
description:
Its an Endless runner where you have a gun and have to kill the monsters in your way and there is a rock that you have to destroy the rope thats holding it so it falls in the hole and you can move over it and destroy any ammo box you see to get ammo clips for when you run out of ammo and it reloads automaticly there is different guns with different stats and different Prices.

Controls:

Mouse to Aim

Left Click to Shoot
